text: La cortigiana di Babilonia (English title: Queen of Babylon) is a 1954 Italian action drama movie directed by Carlo Ludovico Bragaglia and starring Rhonda Fleming, Ricardo Montalb√°n, Roldano Lupi, Carlo Ninchi, Tamara Lees. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:1950s action movies Category:Italian action movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Carlo Ludovico Bragaglia
title: The Queen of Babylon
